q: Fox News' Sean Hannity , Donald Rumsfeld also said the extremist, autocratic rule in Iran is an example of what could happen in Egypt, and other Middle Eastern nations, experiencing signs of political upheaval. If you think of the Iran model, where there was a popular revolution, and it wasn't the populace that ended up in charge- it was a very small, radical, extremist clique- that risk exists[ in other Middle East countries], said Donald Rumsfeld , whose memoir,`` Known and Unknown,'' was published Tuesday.`` The problem we have is there are many elements in a popular revolt. In his previous job, Satya Nadella was responsible for the Bing search engine, the company's MSN portal and Microsoft's advertising platforms, according to his href="http://www.microsoft.com/presspass/exec/Satya Nadella/default.aspx"> biography on Microsoft's site. In that role, Satya Nadella was responsible for the technical vision and engineering of some of the largest Web services and cloud infrastructure on the planet, the bio said. Bob Muglia will stay through the summer in order to help Satya Nadella make the transition, Steve Ballmer said. Meanwhile, Steve Ballmer also announced that Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president of the Server and Cloud

, will presumably carry out what Steve Ballmer previously termed as the Server and Tools Business' move into`` the era of cloud computing.'' In his own Feb. 9 email to employees, Satya Nadella wrote: We are seeing our existing customers move to the cloud to address issues of cost and complexity; tomorrow, our work as leaders in innovation will result in new scenarios and workloads... enabled in the cloud. Allen Iverson made all six of his free throws in the final 23.2 seconds, helping the Nuggets snap a six-game road losing streak that included losses at Dallas and New Orleans at the start of the three-game road trip. It was definitely important, Denver center Marcus Camby said.`` We got our butts kicked the other night down in New Orleans against a great team. You always have to feel http://wn.com/Allen Iverson_Allen Iverson_26pts_Melo_38pts_vs_Sonics_KDurant_37pts_07/08_NBA Touted rookies Kevin Durant and Jeff Green both had career-best efforts for the Seattle SuperSonics and damaged the Denver Nuggets' postseason aspirations. Durant, the second- overall pick in last year's draft and the leading candidate for rookie of the year, scored a season-high 37 points and Jeff Green , the fifth pick, had a season-high 35 to lead the Sonics to a 151-147 double-overtime victory over Denver on Sunday night.`` My teammates were making plays and I was just there finishing them, Jeff Green said. a nationwide panel of 50 media members who regularly cover the league. Michael Vick received 29 1/2 votes, easily beating Seahawks receiver Mike Williams, who got eight.
